content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 1.0, 1.0)

### Wooden Chests at positions(3.5, 1.5), (3.5, 3.5), (3.5, 5.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position 3.5, 1.5)
- Wooden Chest (position 3.5, 3.5)
- Wooden Chest (position 3.5, 5.5)

### Electricity Group at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles at positions (1.5, 3.5), (2.5, 1.5), (2.5, 2.5), (6.5, 4.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 1.0, 1.0) with inventory containing copper plates.

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) and inserter (position unknown) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting electronic circuits
- Ensure you have enough copper-cable and copper-plate available before attempting to craft electronic circuits.

### Errors when crafting solar panels
- Ensure you have enough steel-plate and electronic-circuit available before attempting to craft solar panels.

### Errors when crafting steel plates
- Research the required technology (steel-processing) before attempting to craft steel plates.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the inventory of the furnace before extracting items to avoid extracting when no items are available.

### Errors when using API to get entities
- Verify the position and type of entity you are trying to access to avoid attribute errors. Ensure the entity exists at the specified position.

### Errors when crafting copper cables
- Ensure you have enough copper-plate available before attempting to craft copper cables.
